title: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: Bug 2940Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA) MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)1.
OB: When exporting a zip file in a workspace with multiple projects, the checkboxes for selecting the projects are not updated with a busy cursor during the export process.
EB: The checkboxes for selecting the projects should be updated with a busy cursor during the export process to indicate that the export is in progress.
SR: To reproduce the issue:1. Open a workspace with many projects.2. Initiate the export of a zip file.3. Select all the projects.4. Choose the desired file types.5. Press the 'OK' button.
